meta.name: Paranormal Caught on Camera
meta.description: Some of the most amazing, eye-opening and downright scary paranormal videos from around the world are featured as a panel of experts break down the footage and analyze what exactly the eyewitnesses captured.

videos.title: A Phantom Hand in Brazil and More
The Seedy Texas Motel Poltergeist and More
videos.overview: A traveling businessman encounters poltergeist activity in his Texas motel room, a UFO is spotted over one of the holiest sites on Earth and a Sasquatch is spotted by two hikers in British Columbia.

videos.title: The World's Most Haunted School and More
videos.overview: Poltergeist activity is caught on an Irish school's security camera, two Russians encounter what may be a Sasquatch while driving in Siberia and a UFO is spotted flying over Australia in broad daylight.

videos.title: The Montauk Monster and More
videos.overview: An internet-famous monster washes up again on a New York beach, parents catch ghosts haunting nurseries on baby monitors and a UFO saves a Russian town.

videos.title: Gettysburg Ghosts and More
videos.overview: A ghost appears on the Gettysburg battlefield, a sea monster surfaces in Ireland and fleets of UFOs are spotted over the skies of Philadelphia and The Hague.

videos.title: Haunted Antique Store and More
videos.overview: A poltergeist haunts an English antique store, a father and son encounter Bigfoot in Washington and a strange UFO is spotted over Inner Mongolia.

videos.title: Infamous Oregon Bigfoot Footage and More
videos.overview: An Oregon man captures some of the best Bigfoot footage ever, crazy UFOs cluster over a Texas town and a Wales resident deals with a poltergeist roommate.

videos.title: A UFO Spotted Over the Pentagon and More
videos.overview: A pyramid-shaped UFO is spotted over the Pentagon, a father and his children are spooked by a ghost on a playground in Rhode Island and a security camera captures strange creatures stalking a California neighborhood.

videos.title: Ghostly Regulars at Haunted Pubs and More
videos.overview: Ghostly patrons haunt pubs throughout the United Kingdom, a shadow creature stalks a police officer on an empty plane in Mexico City and a sea monster is spotted by multiple witnesses on the Thames.

videos.title: Encounter at an Abandoned Asylum and More
videos.overview: A paranormal investigator is attacked by an entity in an abandoned asylum in Connecticut, a driver witnesses a strange UFO over a hotel in North Carolina and an Oregon marijuana dispensary is haunted by ghosts of the past.

videos.title: A Highly Haunted Hotel in Arkansas and More
videos.overview: A couple learns they're sharing their hotel room with a ghostly guest in Arkansas, a strange formation floats over a Philadelphia neighborhood and a monstrous creature washes up on the beach in the Philippines.

videos.title: Florida Sea Monster Attack and More
videos.overview: A couple encounters a vicious sea monster while boating off the Florida coast, a man's house is haunted after he opens a supposedly cursed box and a strange figure appears in the sky during a thunderstorm in Alabama.

videos.title: Utah Bigfoot Hunt and More
videos.overview: Friends in Utah track down a Bigfoot spotted in the mountains, a total skeptic is attacked by a spirit at a haunted fort in England and ghostly passengers appear in a Hong Kong airport.

videos.title: Dire Wolf Attack, Dog vs. Ghost, Gollum-Like Cryptid and More
videos.overview: A home security camera captures a dog's scary encounter with a ghost, a strange creature is spotted deep within a cave in the Alps and UFOs are witnessed during the daytime by people all over the globe.

videos.title: Pennsylvania Shadow Person and More
videos.overview: A Pennsylvania family is terrorized by a shadowy entity in their own home, a brazen Bigfoot appears in front of a large group of shocked witnesses in Oregon and two UFOs put on a show in the skies above Bath, England.

videos.title: Delaware Ghost Bridge and More
videos.overview: A group of friends test a local legend of a haunted bridge, a UFO is spotted from a plane window over California and a horrifying creature from the darkest corners of the internet is found in Oregon.

videos.title: Demonic Doll and More
videos.overview: A Pennsylvania family is terrorized by a haunted doll, two friends witness a fleet of UFOs in the night sky and a man encounters the infamous Yowie in the Australian outback.

videos.title: Modern-day Cyclops and More
videos.overview: Experts are baffled by recent sightings of one-eyed creatures, a team of graveyard investigators confront the undead and demonic dolls run amok in a museum of haunted artifacts.

videos.title: A Basket Full of Ghosts and More
videos.overview: A haunted basket mystifies a mother and daughter, a mythical creature is spotted in Wales and two intrepid investigators come face-to-face with Slenderman.

videos.title: Pushy Poltergeists and More
videos.overview: A hike turns terrifying when a father and son are stalked by a mysterious creature, bone-chilling shrieks strike fear into residents of a Colombian town and US Navy pilots are stumped when their radar locks in on unidentified aircraft.

videos.title: Arkansas Bigfoot Stalks a Father and Son and More
videos.overview: A hike turns terrifying when a father and son are stalked by a mysterious creature, bone-chilling shrieks strike fear into residents of a Colombian town and US Navy pilots are stumped when their radar locks in on unidentified aircraft.

videos.title: A Texas Ghost Attack Draws Blood and More
videos.overview: Blood is drawn when a paranormal investigator explores an abandoned hospital in Texas, a baby's innocent play beckons a powerful entity and a snake hunter gets more than he bargained for when he spots a snake-like object in the sky.

videos.title: Insanely Haunted Hospital in Michigan and More
videos.overview: Paranormal investigators capture some truly terrifying footage in a haunted asylum, a father and son spot the mother of all UFOs, a poltergeist wreaks havoc in a vape shop and a legendary cryptid stalks a group of children.

videos.title: A Colossal Lake Creature in Chile and More
videos.overview: A lake monster stalks a group of swimmers, a security guard confronts a terrifying shadow person in an empty stadium, a college student is tormented by a ghostly roommate and a Russian man goes on the hunt for a Yeti.

videos.title: Uninvited English House Ghoul and More
videos.overview: A paranormal presence follows an investigator home, a UFO plays chicken with a freighter, a fearless family captures compelling evidence of Bigfoot and the ghost of a small child runs through a Savannah cemetery.

videos.title: A Shadow Creature in Maine and More
videos.overview: A man encounters a terrifying shadow creature in his bedroom, an unidentified light is spotted above Fairbanks, Alaska, and a Detroit brewery is visited by an angelic entity.

videos.title: Jinn on the Prowl and More
videos.overview: A ghost hunter is pushed to the brink by a demonic jinn, a shadow person invades a home in the UK and a creepy doll haunts a suburban basement.

videos.title: Beware the Doll at the Haunted Inn and More
videos.overview: A doll comes to life at a notoriously haunted hotel, a UFO is spotted flying suspiciously close to a volcano, a man gains a ghostly bedmate and locals are stumped by strange lights in the Ozarks.

videos.title: The Ghost of Al Capone and More
videos.overview: Ghost hunters make contact with an infamous gangster, a flying witch terrifies onlookers, a poltergeist torments a college student and something is alive in the sewers.

videos.title: A Sasquatch Spotted in Siberia and More
videos.overview: Three boys spot a Sasquatch-like creature in Siberia, a couple captures ghostly soldiers on camera in Gettysburg and a teenager is terrified by a freakish formation in the sky.

videos.title: Roadside Ghost Bride and More
videos.overview: A ghostly woman in white strolls along a dark highway, an underwater entity stalks a boat in a canal and a gas station employee makes contact with a mysterious humanoid.

videos.title: Ghost Dogs and More
videos.overview: Beloved pets visit their owners from beyond the grave, a poltergeist moves chairs in a sports bar and a couple is interrupted by an uninvited dinner ghost.

videos.title: A Haunted Bar and More
videos.overview: A destructive spirit wreaks havoc on a bar, three boys encounter a Sasquatch-like creature in the woods and dozes of worm-shaped UFOs appear over South America.

videos.title: A Frightening Ghost Attack and More
videos.overview: A shadowy entity attacks a ghost hunter, a mechanic is visited by an angel and a family hears the bloodcurdling howls of a Bigfoot.

videos.title: An Arsonist Ghost and More
videos.overview: Two brothers tangle with a ghost that likes to set fires, a mother ship unleashes an army of UFOs and a man faces terrifying consequences when he teases an interdimensional being.

videos.title: A Ventriloquist Dummy Comes to Life and More
videos.overview: A antique ventriloquist dummy is taken over by an otherworldly entity, a haunted hotel gives a ghost hunter the fright of his life, a woman's apartment is invaded by a ferocious shadow creature and more.

videos.title: Ghostly Abandoned Prisons and More
videos.overview: A man explores a haunted prison with terrifying results, a jellyfish-like object levitates in the bright daylight of a Las Vegas summer day and a biker's backwoods jaunt is interrupted by a mysterious creature.

videos.title: A Fire Smokes Out a Cryptid in Oklahoma and More
videos.overview: A brush fire spooks a Sasquatch in Oklahoma, spirits torment a security guard at Savannah cemetery, a fleet of UFOs stun onlookers in Poland and more.

videos.title: Chased by a Bigfoot and More
videos.overview: A Sasquatch chases a group of young Russians to their car, a mother's worst fears are confirmed when security cameras capture two entities in her new home, mysterious sounds trumpet from the skies and more.

videos.title: A Haunted Farmhouse in Maine and More
videos.overview: A ghost hunter communicates with trapped spirits inside a 19th-century farmhouse, hundreds of UFOs are spotted off the coast of Florida, a motorcyclist in India has a close call with creepy entity and more.

videos.title: Mysterious Mesa Lights and More
videos.overview: A couple spies multiple UFOs in the skies above Arizona, a poltergeist stalks a Florida family, a cryptid hunter gets up close and personal with a Bigfoot in North Carolina and more.

videos.title: Ghost Hunt in a Haunted Prison and More
videos.overview: A paranormal team gets the shock of their lives while investigating an abandoned Illinois prison, a UFO gets dangerously close to two commercial jets and a ghostly local legend shows itself in England.

videos.title: Reptilian Creature in Thailand and More
videos.overview: A man searches for answers after he spots a reptilian creature in Thailand, a baby has a terrifying encounter with a ghost and a war-torn ship yields a haunting message.

videos.title: Flying Cryptid Over Chicago and More
videos.overview: A man stands in awe as he watches mysterious creatures fly over Chicago. A group of teens pay the price when they travel down a notoriously haunted road in New Jersey. Ghost hunters explore an abandoned church infected with a powerful demonic presence.

videos.title: Hawaiian UFOs and More
videos.overview: A man captures three glowing UFOs hovering over government property in Hawaii. Paranormal investigators contact the spirit of a little boy in a haunted cave. Faithful followers watch a crucifix shake on its own in India.

videos.title: A Haunted Gift and More
videos.overview: A Delaware family's home is terrorized by an evil spirit, playgrounds around the world open up their gates to more than just the living and a colossal creature is spotted near the shore of an Irish lake.

videos.title: Alaskan Sea Serpent and More
videos.overview: A tourist captures startling footage of a giant sea serpent in Alaska, an unsuspecting ghost hunter is assaulted by a vengeful spirit and a bipedal beast roams the hills alongside a California highway.

videos.title: Haunted by a Rock Legend and More
videos.overview: Paranormal investigators communicate with a dearly departed rock legend. A ghostly canine joins its former owner for a nighttime stroll. A government camera captures high-quality evidence of Bigfoot.

videos.title: Las Vegas UFOs and More
videos.overview: A Florida man encounters an elusive -- and stinky -- Sasquatch. Ghost hunters attempt to contact the spirit of a murder victim in Tennessee. A Las Vegas resident captures of incredible footage of UFOs soaring in the skies.

videos.title: Pennhurst Asylum and More
videos.overview: Ghost hunters encounter a shadow person in an abandoned Pennsylvania asylum. An Iowa couple accidentally brings home a haunted statue. A mom in Kentucky discovers a real-life boogeyman hiding n her daughter's closet.

videos.title: An Ogopogo Sighting and More
videos.overview: A father and son record unprecedented evidence of a Canadian lake monster. A doorbell security camera captures fiery orbs falling from the skies above California. An investigative team is accosted by the spirits of a murdered family in Nevada.

videos.title: Haunted Dam and More
videos.overview: Two men stumble upon the apparition of a ghostly bride in a haunted church. Shocking drone footage captures the elusive Ohio Grassman. A ferry sits in the cross hairs of battling UFOs along the banks of North Carolina.

videos.title: Seance Possession and More
videos.overview: A man is possessed by an evil entity during a seance in York, England. An Oregon woman is stunned by a glowing UFO hovering above her new home. A ghost hunter is violently attacked by a poltergeist in an abandoned nursing home with a horrific past.

videos.title: Stonehenge UFOs and More
videos.overview: Mysterious lights hover in the skies above Stonehenge on the eve of the summer solstice. A woman witnesses a soul leaving a dead deer's body. A Florida man finds grisly proof of a violent extraterrestrial attack.

videos.title: New York UFO and More
videos.overview: A military veteran spies an otherworldly aircraft flying in the skies above New York. Screaming ghosts haunt the halls of an abandoned home in Belgium. A New Jersey couple discovers their dog has a paranormal playmate.

videos.title: Ghost Kitty and More
videos.overview: A Florida man records a werewolf speeding across his backyard. A feline friend returns from the grave to visit its owner -- and take a nap? Two Chinese explorers get a horrifying glimpse into a haunted mirror.

videos.title: Haunted Teddy Bear and More
videos.overview: A tenacious teddy bear terrorizes twins in Texas. A man is tormented by a vengeful spirit in an abandoned garage. A woman fears an alien invasion outside her window in California.

videos.title: Teen Vampire and More
videos.overview: A young man stuns his friends with a vampiric transformation. A man witnesses a possible alien invasion in California. A popular app leads a Canadian college student to a haunted location.

videos.title: A Wave From the Grave and More
videos.overview: A murderous spirit toys with a paranormal investigator trapped in a closet. A shadow figure makes itself at home in Chile. A dead man waves at his family members through his coffin window.

videos.title: High School Shadow Figure and More
videos.overview: A shadowy entity roams the halls of an abandoned South Dakota high school. An evening stroll with the family pooch turns into an extraterrestrial encounter. Blood-curdling screams rain from the skies during a Texas thunderstorm.

videos.overview: A ghostly prankster torments the staff at a Scottish grocery store. A UFO flies across an airport runway in Puerto Rico. A legendary child-snatching cryptid is spotted in Bolivia.

videos.title: OMG Caught On Camera
videos.overview: Two friends emerge unharmed after a car plows into a restaurant. Skydivers miraculously survive after their planes collide. A Utah man stares death in the face as he's stalked by an angry cougar. All that and more will have you screaming "OMG!"

videos.overview: A college student gets a ghostly roommate in Arizona. A paranormal investigator is antagonized by an ancient entity in Saudi Arabia. A Florida mother and her daughter are profoundly moved by a UFO sighting.

videos.overview: A shadow figure makes itself at home in a North Carolina couple's bathroom. A werewolf stalks a man in his own backyard in Brazil. A ghostly customer trashes an adult store in Taiwan.

videos.overview: A ghostly child leaves its handprint on a bathroom mirror. A sinister spirit takes control of a willing paranormal investigator. A mermaid goes for a dip in a Tennessee lake.

videos.overview: A woman in Tennessee is terrified to discover she is not alone while working from home. A ghoulish creature creeps up behind a group of friends in Indonesia. A Minnesota man seeks answers about a UFO sighting near his house.

videos.title: Haunted Pinata and More
videos.overview: A shop owner in Mexico loses customers to a haunted pi√±ata. A man in Russia is driven out of an abandoned house by an angry poltergeist. And could a woman in California be an actual UFO magnet?

videos.title: Demon Looms Over a Baby in Las Vegas and More
videos.overview: A grandmother catches a demon on a baby monitor. A man records stunning footage of glistening rainbow UFO in California. Mind-bending phenomena around the globe reveal a glitch in the matrix.

videos.title: Montana Nightcrawler and More
videos.overview: A man in Montana wonders what happened to a dead deer on his property -- until he sees the terrifying creature that may be responsible. A centuries-old hacienda is haunted by a shadow figure. A military airbase in Germany is visited by a UFO.

videos.title: A Spirit Wanders Through Kentucky and More
videos.overview: A security guard catches a spirit wandering around a Kentucky whiskey distillery. Paranormal investigators are met with bone-chilling laughter as they hunt for a witch in the dark. A man comes dangerously close to a skunk ape in the Mississippi backwoods.

videos.overview: A shadowy apparition wanders through a Titanic exhibit in Tennessee. A creature that is half monkey and half witch scurries up a quiet neighborhood street in Costa Rica. A spectral moose stuns a woman in Alaska as it runs across the surface of a river.

videos.overview: A North Carolina man fights off a rabid bobcat in his front yard. An experienced caver finds himself trapped in rising waters. A hang glider holds on for dear life hundreds of feet above Switzerland. Two dogs are rescued from a frigid reservoir.

videos.overview: A truck driver rushes headlong into danger when a car bursts into flames on the road in Mississippi. A Florida man wrestles an alligator to save his puppy. Parents all over the world dive into action to save their children from certain death.

videos.overview: A school in the Philippines houses spirits from an adjacent cemetery. Shadow figures and phantom flames lurk within an abandoned brick factory in Italy. A group of friends witness a massive UFO taking off in Argentina.

videos.title: Mischievous Duende in Argentina and More
videos.overview: Paranormal investigators capture a shadow figure in a haunted Nevada prison. A hidebehind in Oregon gives a girl and her grandma a serious fright. A tiny elfin creature makes a toddler uneasy in Argentina.

videos.title: Ghost Girl in Chicago Bar and More
videos.overview: A dark entity shows itself to investigators inside one of America's most haunted homes. The ghost of a young girl materializes in an Illinois bar. A father and son in California film a UFO that appears to be alive.

videos.title: Inside the Screaming House and More
videos.overview: UK investigators are confronted by a dark presence in an abandoned home. Is Bigfoot stalking two brothers in Rochester, NY? A smoke break in San Juan turns into a double UFO sighting.

videos.title: Green Creature in Aruba Cave and More
videos.overview: A party store in Mexico is plagued by a malicious entity. A treasure hunt is interrupted by Bigfoot in New Mexico. A mysterious green creature lurks inside a cave in Aruba.

videos.title: The Departed DJ and More
videos.overview: A creature that tormented an Australian man's childhood is back for more. A DJ in North Carolina is still spinning sets from beyond the grave. A UFO in Islamabad remains immobile for hours.

videos.title: Little Girl vs. Ghost and More
videos.overview: In Michigan, a toddler plays a spirited game of tug of war -- with a ghost. A paranormal enthusiast in England captures a shadow figure lurking at the foot of his bed. A massive lake monster surfaces in China.

videos.title: The Darkness Over Houston and More
videos.overview: An unknown entity continues to torment a New Jersey family. A strange specter spies on a paranormal investigator at an abandoned train station in Sweden. A woman captures a mysterious dark mass hovering in the skies above Houston.

videos.title: Mysterious Lights in Moab and More
videos.overview: A Bigfoot enthusiast captures evidence of the legendary cryptid's elusive cousin -- the Ohio Grassman. Mysterious glowing orbs manifest in the Utah desert. A haunted doll torments a family in Canada.

videos.overview: Mysterious hovering lights haunt a couple along the highway; an explorer investigates Minnesota's most haunted cemetery; a disembodied voice gives a young boy the shock of his life.

videos.title: Singing Ghost in Arkansas and More
videos.overview: A family visiting a museum in England spots something terrifying; a cryptid sighting stuns two business partners in New Jersey; a notoriously haunted hotel in Arkansas lives up to its reputation.

videos.title: The Phantom Hand of Leicester and More
videos.overview: A man in England is startled by a spiritual manifestation in his home. A childlike specter crashes a dinner party in Colombia. A Canadian couple spots fire-like UFOS hovering above a river.

videos.title: Mysterious Titanic Exhibit Flood and More
videos.overview: An unexplainable flood occurs at a museum's Titanic Exhibit in Illinois. Two hikers on Vancouver Island come across a possible Bigfoot on the trail. Plane passengers witness something shocking in the sky.

videos.title: Robert the Doll and More
videos.overview: The world's most haunted doll shows off its magic. A family in Oklahoma has a ghostly new roommate. A mysterious pulsing cylinder is seen floating above the sea in Chile. A misty cryptid is caught on a security cam in the woods of Wisconsin

videos.title: Summoning a Demon in Canada and More
videos.overview: In Canada, a ghost hunter regrets summoning a demon in an abandoned house. In North Carolina, a beloved deceased dog visits its owner from the afterlife. A mysterious shapeshifting cryptid runs across a field in Argentina.

videos.title: A Christmas Spirit and More
videos.overview: A holiday elf perched in a family home attracts the spirit of a little boy. A man in Canada is called out by name by a phantom voice. Did a Montana man catch something on his thermal camera from another world?

videos.title: Bigfoot in Great Britain and More!
videos.overview: A bushcraft expert in England encounters a bigfoot-like creature; a walk down Route 66 in Arizona turns terrifying; three men in Argentina discover something receding into a coffin; mysterious orbs try to communicate with a woman in New Jersey.

videos.title: The Haunted Pub of Doncaster and More
videos.overview: Dearly departed patrons frequent a UK pub; a pregnant woman is stalked by a shapeshifting creature in the Philippines; a Louisiana man witnesses ghostly children playing on a school bus.

videos.title: A Spirited Infirmary in Indiana and More
videos.overview: Two investigators feel unwelcomed by spirits at an abandoned Indiana infirmary; a high-flying cryptid gives a warning in Chicago; a woman in Mexico is shocked to see her painting come to life.

videos.title: New Jersey Drone Investigation and More
videos.overview: An investigator seeks answers to numerous reports of UAPs in New Jersey; two hikers take refuge from a storm in a haunted hut in Scotland; a California man's canine companion calls out from the other side.

videos.title: Penitentiary Phantoms in Tennessee and More
videos.overview: Three investigators brave an abandoned penitentiary with a violent past in Tennessee; a piano-playing ghost entertains guests in an Upstate New York house rental; a mysterious figure looms over a coal mine in Mexico.

videos.title: Colorado Bigfoot Sighting and More
videos.overview: A river raft guide spots an infamous cryptid along the Colorado River; a UK man taking out his trash appears to pick up a ghostly hitchhiker; a Las Vegas couple manifests a bright light in the sky while stargazing in their backyard.

videos.title: Eerie Apparition in Philadelphia and More
videos.overview: An otherworldly figure walks across a Pennsylvania woman's front lawn; a haunted doll gets physical with its visitors in England; animals are frozen in time around the world.

videos.title: The Tall Man of South Pittsburg Hospital and More
videos.overview: A woman stumbles upon a towering shadow figure inside a deserted Tennessee hospital; japanese investigators encounter ghostly guests in an abandoned hotel; a man in Portugal lounging on his balcony is mesmerized by a floating metallic orb.

videos.title: A Phantom Hand in Brazil and More
